metadata.name: API Producers Competency Package
metadata.shortDescription: API Producers: turn business specifications into challenge questions and API-ready inputs.
metadata.description: Competency package focused on producing APIs from specifications: reviewing human-written specs, challenging ambiguities, and preparing inputs for API contract design.
objectives: Challenge specifications to unblock API design
Produce structured inputs for API contract definition
metadata.author: OLAF Framework

entry_points.name: Review Human Written Spec
entry_points.description: Analyze a human specification to challenge it and produce SME questions required for API design.

entry_points.name: Analyze DB API Fit
entry_points.description: Analyze functional spec + OpenAPI against existing database schemas to identify data gaps and integration risks for microservices.

entry_points.name: Plan DB API Remediation
entry_points.description: Translate DB↔API fit mismatches into delivery impact decisions and a phased remediation plan.

entry_points.name: Generate DDL And Seed
entry_points.description: Generate a new database schema (DDL) and initialization data from the latest OpenAPI contract and DB↔API fit analysis when no DB exists yet.

entry_points.name: Scaffold API From Spec
entry_points.description: Incrementally scaffold a Quarkus API, TypeScript SDK, and Bruno CLI tests from the latest functional spec, OpenAPI contract, and DB↔API fit analysis.

entry_points.name: Align Spec, OpenAPI, Code, and Tests
entry_points.description: Detect drift and align functional spec, OpenAPI, implementation code, and tests with least-impact recommendations.

entry_points.name: Generate Contract Kit
entry_points.description: Collect OpenAPI, specifications, SDK, and tests into a consumer-ready contract-kit with examples and scenario walkthroughs.
